review: It did not work on my tv. I am very disappointed. I read the reviews and they were bad. I am trying it at my friends house if it doesn't  work I am returning it. This is the first time I am unhappy.
author: patricia maslen

review: It's like Netflix except you are charged for tv shows and some movies. I only pay $11 for Netflix. That's with tv shows and movies. No extra cost. I really thought for the amount of money we are paying it would be different than Netflix. And not be charged for each show.
author: Kindle Customer

review: Amazing. Much easier and faster to use then my previous Playstation 3 setup.
author: Ghost Rabbit

review: Love, love, love it. Just wishing for a few more recent movies.
author: William Chitwood

review: Best purchase on Amazon so far!
author: C Bird
